pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Enabling dynamic linking for Windows build

content.raw:
@scpeters I saw the windows build failing on “D:\\Jenkins\\workspace\\gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64\\ws\\gazebo\\plugins\\[LiftDragPlugin.cc](http://LiftDragPlugin.cc)\(400\): fatal error C1001: An internal error has occurred in the compiler.  
\(compiler file 'msc1.cpp', line 1518\)” and later another error like this “java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space”. Can you take a look to see if it is a build machine issue? \(Like out-of-memory or out-of-space?\)
content.html:
@scpeters I saw the windows build failing on “D:\Jenkins\workspace\gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\gazebo\plugins\LiftDragPlugin.cc(400): fatal error C1001: An internal error has occurred in the compiler.
(compiler file 'msc1.cpp', line 1518)” and later another error like this “java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space”. Can you take a look to see if it is a build machine issue? (Like out-of-memory or out-of-space?)
